Hat's Brain Dump

About

This is the base Jekyll theme. You can find out more info about customizing your Jekyll theme, as well as basic Jekyll usage documentation at jekyllrb.com

You can find the source code for Minima at GitHub: jekyll / minima

You can find the source code for Jekyll at GitHub: jekyll / jekyll

My personal blog where any given day I will attempt to convert the thoughts flowing through my mind into text. It has been four years since I have blogged so bear with me, enjoy the old material which I also now laugh at, and feel free to critique anything that I write.
